the" tip of the iceberg" had been seen so far. Last year Eric Schmidt and Sergey Brin clashed over censorship and security in China. Google threatened to withdraw from the country after what it called a highly sophisticated and targeted attack on our corporate infrastructure originating from China. " There were occasional moments when he thought I was off the farm," Mr. Colin Powell said of Mr. Dick Cheney , who as defense secretary was the civilian leader in charge of the military, including Mr. Colin Powell . I generally knew when I had stepped over the line and he quickly reminded me I had stepped over the line. Mr. Colin Powell and Mr. Dick Cheney went on to have far more venomous struggles before the Iraq invasion of 2003-- Mr. Dick Cheney pushed for war, Mr. Colin Powell warned against it, then went along-- and their

people give him credit for." Though Dermot O'Leary admits he enjoys working with Simon Cowell , he and the rest of the people who work with the music mogul hate to let him down. He added: Don't get me wrong, he's still my boss, but he's sort of a Victorian father- you'd hate to let him down. On the occasion that happens I literally feel sick. While Dermot O'Leary would love to continue working with Simon Cowell by taking a role on the US' X Factor' he is trying not to worry about it. Subscribe to RSSMost Popular in: Entertainment

leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Page and Google Inc. 's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google Inc. 's executive chairman. The changes will be effective April 4.
